video.title: Bob's Burgers
video.synopsis: This Emmy-winning animated series centers on Bob Belcher and his ragtag burger-flippers, who are desperate to get their greasy spoon off the ground.

episodes.synopsis: Rallying the team to cook up some business, Bob sends Gene to push samples on the street, Tina to work the grill and Louise to staff the counter.
episodes.title: Human Flesh

episodes.synopsis: When Bob learns that Linda's mother is coming for a visit, he wants nothing to do with it. Linda cracks the whip at home to prepare.
episodes.title: Crawl Space

episodes.synopsis: When a controversial documentary filmmaker places a live cow outside of the family restaurant to make a statement, it starts to scare away customers.
episodes.title: Sacred Cow

episodes.synopsis: When Tina develops a crush on the town's new martial arts instructor, she joins the class and ends up shirking her responsibilities at the restaurant.
episodes.title: Sexy Dance Fighting

episodes.synopsis: Bob lets Linda and the kids stage a murder mystery dinner theater in the restaurant, but an abrupt interruption changes the play's direction.
episodes.title: Hamburger Dinner Theater

episodes.synopsis: Tina is desperate to get her first kiss at her 13th birthday party, and Bob takes a second job as a late-night cab driver to pay for Tina's party.
episodes.title: Sheesh! Cab, Bob?

episodes.synopsis: With a long weekend approaching, Linda sees an opportunity to capitalize on the tourist traffic by starting a bed and breakfast.
episodes.title: Bed & Breakfast

episodes.synopsis: When Linda asks Bob to let her sister hang her paintings in the restaurant for Art Week, Bob is forced to contend with the city's Art Council.
episodes.title: Art Crawl

episodes.synopsis: When Bob and Gene start watching Spaghetti Western films, they wind up alienating Louise. Gene takes pointers on how to deal with his rival at school.
episodes.title: Spaghetti Western & Meatballs

episodes.synopsis: Bob's eccentric landlord informs Bob that his rival across the street wants to take over Bob's lease so that he can expand his gift shop.
episodes.title: Burger Wars

episodes.synopsis: The family spends the weekend at Mort the Mortician's while the restaurant is being de-molded, and Linda and Bob double date with Mort.
episodes.title: Weekend at Mort's

episodes.synopsis: After the annual Lobsterfest is cancelled by a storm, Bob defiantly opens for a celebration. The next morning, Bob finds the town has spurned him.
episodes.title: Lobsterfest

episodes.synopsis: The dark underbelly of minor league baseball threatens to corrupt the Belchers when Bob befriends a washed-up baseball player named Torpedo Jones.
episodes.title: Torpedo

episodes.synopsis: When the kids go exploring inside a derelict taffy factory that's slated for demolition, Bob must get them out before the building is destroyed.
episodes.title: The Belchies

episodes.synopsis: When a robber takes hostages at the bank across the street from the restaurant, Bob tries to turn the situation to his advantage.
episodes.title: Bob Day Afternoon

episodes.synopsis: In order to get out of gym class, the Belcher kids sign up for a sham independent study course in synchronized swimming.
episodes.title: Synchronized Swimming

episodes.synopsis: When his rival Jimmy Pesto snubs him after outperforming him on a video game, Bob becomes obsessed with claiming the new high score for himself.
episodes.title: Burgerboss

episodes.synopsis: Pressured by his family, Bob buys a food truck to take his burgers on the road. But when the kids act up, other food truck owners rise in revolt.
episodes.title: Food Truckin'

episodes.synopsis: When he inadvertently causes Linda's sister, Gayle, to fall in love with him, Bob turns to his dentist, Dr. Yap, for help.
episodes.title: Dr. Yap

episodes.synopsis: After a negative review by the Moody Foodie, a notoriously harsh restaurant critic, Bob tries to force the man to give him another chance.
episodes.title: Moody Foodie

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to impress Jimmy Pesto, Jr., Tina starts hanging around with troublesome teen Tammy and soon lands herself in hot water.
episodes.title: Bad Tina

episodes.synopsis: Bob appears on the cooking segment of a local TV show, but he's upstaged by Gene who barges onto the set wearing a sasquatch mask.
episodes.title: Beefsquatch

episodes.synopsis: While Bob copes with the unwanted patronage of the One-Eyed Snakes biker gang, Louise loses her cool after a school bully steals her bunny ears.
episodes.title: Ear-Sy Rider

episodes.synopsis: On Halloween, the Belcher kids sneak off to trick-or-treat in a posh neighborhood, while Bob and Linda get into hot water at Teddy's costume party.
episodes.title: Full Bars

episodes.synopsis: Bob's plan to liberate the kids from summer work backfires when, after firing them, they secretly start working for a pair of marijuana growers.
episodes.title: Bob Fires the Kids

episodes.synopsis: When Bob is invited to be a private chef on a docked cruise ship, he brings the family along to witness his skills outside of the restaurant.
episodes.title: Mutiny on the Windbreaker

episodes.synopsis: Bob's favorite holiday of all time, and this year he is determined to make it the most memorable Thanksgiving ever.
episodes.title: An Indecent Thanksgiving Proposal

episodes.synopsis: In an homage to Jaws, Bob's landlord and pier proprietor Mr. Fischoeder buys a mechanical shark as a pier attraction.
episodes.title: The Deepening

episodes.synopsis: After Tina accidentally wrecks the car, and gets the whole family involved with a slimy insurance agent, she worries that she's a "jinx.
episodes.title: Tina-Rannosaurus Wrecks

episodes.synopsis: After Gene gets suckered into dating Courtney, his first girlfriend ever, the entire family wants him to break up with her when they decide she's totally annoying.
episodes.title: The Unbearable Like-Likeness of Gene

episodes.synopsis: When Bob discovers that the storage unit he inherited is home to an oddball named Chet, he invites Chet to spend the holidays at the restaurant.
episodes.title: Bob Rest Ye Merry Gentle-Mannequins

episodes.synopsis: Linda frets that Louise doesn't like her and, to Louise's chagrin, forces her to attend a Mother-Daughter seminar to beef up their relationship.
episodes.title: Mother Daughter Laser Razor

episodes.synopsis: When hated health inspector Hugo quits to become a nudist, Bob rejoices until Hugo's blackmailing replacement proves to be an even bigger headache.
episodes.title: Nude Beach

episodes.synopsis: There is a "Mad Pooper" running wild at the Belcher children's middle school and Tina finds herself on a mission to get to the "bottom" of the situation.
episodes.title: Broadcast Wagstaff School News

episodes.synopsis: When a heart-shaped pancake simply doesn't cut it, the kids convince Bob to let them skip school in order to help him find a Valentine's Day gift that will "wow" Linda.
episodes.title: My Fuzzy Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Feeling unappreciated, Linda quits the restaurant to work at a grocery store, but divided marital loyalties soon take a toll on the entire family.
episodes.title: Lindapendent Woman

episodes.synopsis: In an homage to E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial, Gene finds an expensive talking toilet and befriends it.
episodes.title: O.T. The Outside Toilet

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly when Louise is determined to take down her Thomas Edison-obsessed science teacher by recreating a famous experiment.
episodes.title: Topsy

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy Jr. is threatened when Tina starts dating a ballet dancer named Josh.
episodes.title: Two for Tina

episodes.synopsis: The Belcher family road-trips down to Florida to visit Linda's parents who live in a senior home that - to Linda's complete horror - is full of senior swingers!
episodes.title: It Snakes a Village

episodes.synopsis: After the family car breaks down and ruins their plans for a movie night out, the Belchers find themselves competing on the TV game show "Family Fracas!"
episodes.title: Family Fracas

episodes.synopsis: After a knife accident, Linda takes Bob to the hospital and leaves the restaurant in the hands of the kids, who turn the basement into a casino.
episodes.title: The Kids Run the Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: While accompanying Tina to a Boyz 4 Now concert, boy-hating Louise makes a surprising discovery. Gene competes in a tablescaping competition.
episodes.title: Boyz 4 Now

episodes.synopsis: Bob chaperones a museum school trip and has a father-daughter bonding moment with Louise, while Gene and Zeke bond over exhibits of female anatomy.
episodes.title: Carpe Museum

episodes.synopsis: After Gene loses his confidence at his baseball game, Linda decides to sign him up for baseball camp.
episodes.title: The Unnatural

episodes.synopsis: The Belchers' camping trip brings them closer to the wonders of nature, including white-water rapids and Bob's troubled digestive system.
episodes.title: A River Runs Through Bob

episodes.synopsis: The Belcher kids celebrate Halloween by constructing a fort, but they end up barricaded inside it for the night by a visit from annoying Millie.
episodes.title: Fort Night

episodes.synopsis: Linda enrolls herself and Bob in flying lessons, but she ends up going alone -- which her instructor, "Upskirt Kurt," doesn't seem to mind.
episodes.title: Seaplane!

episodes.synopsis: Bob takes a temporary assignment as a cook for a third-rate fraternity and gets caught up in its prank war with a rival house.
episodes.title: My Big Fat Greek Bob

episodes.synopsis: After Bob loses his temper, someone gets their revenge by stuffing Bob's beautifully prepared Thanksgiving turkey into the toilet.
episodes.title: Turkey in a Can

episodes.synopsis: Linda's class reunion gives her the chance to reunite her old band, the Ta-Tas, and redeem their failed high school talent show performance.
episodes.title: Purple Rain - Union

episodes.synopsis: Bob temporarily teaches Tina's home economics class and turns it into a restaurant. But Tina soon learns there's a downside to having Bob in charge.
episodes.title: Bob and Deliver

episodes.synopsis: When her mother invites her classmates over for a surprise slumber party, Louise enlists Tina and Gene to help her find a way to send them back home.
episodes.title: Slumber Party

episodes.synopsis: Fired as Jimmy Jr.'s assistant, Tina enters a magic contest herself. Meanwhile, Bob believes he has been cursed by a magician.
episodes.title: Presto Tina-O

episodes.synopsis: Bob pulls out all the stops, including hiring a former pro football star, to make a Super Bowl commercial that will put a rival restaurant to shame.
episodes.title: Easy Com-Mercial, Easy Go-Mercial

episodes.synopsis: Assigned to write about a fantasy version of Wagstaff, the Belcher kids turn in papers that land Bob and Linda in a parent-teacher meeting.
episodes.title: The Frond Files

episodes.synopsis: Awkwardness ensues when Tina, who wasn't invited to Tammy's bat mitzvah, ends up at the event anyway as Bob's catering assistant.
episodes.title: Mazel Tina

episodes.synopsis: Teddy hopes to become the Belcher kids' beloved "Uncle Teddy" when he babysits while Bob and Linda attend an out-of-town burger convention.
episodes.title: Uncle Teddy

episodes.synopsis: When train seating separates Bob and Linda from the kids, they engage in a wine-tasting battle as Louise leads a chocolate raid on the restaurant car.
episodes.title: The Kids Rob a Train

episodes.synopsis: When Linda correctly predicts that a telemarketer is calling the restaurant, the kids believe she is psychic -- much to Bob's dismay.
episodes.title: I Get Psy-Chic Out of You

episodes.synopsis: At a convention celebrating the magical pony cartoon series "The Equestranauts," Tina discovers that most of her fellow fans are grown men.
episodes.title: The Equestranauts

episodes.synopsis: After discovering a lump of ambergris -- a highly valued whale by-product -- the kids turn into money-hungry, treacherous fiends.
episodes.title: Ambergris

episodes.synopsis: When she learns that Louise is hiding out from the dentist at her Aunt Gail's, Linda bets she won't survive the weekend with Gail's daffy behavior.
episodes.title: The Kids Run Away

episodes.synopsis: When Tina bites her tongue during cheerleading tryouts, Louise is happy to serve as her unintelligible sister's translator.
episodes.title: Gene It On

episodes.synopsis: Bob tries to persuade Mr. Fischoeder to sell Wonder Wharf. Meanwhile, Tina chains herself to the carousel to block its demolition.
episodes.title: Wharf Horse

episodes.synopsis: Linda and the kids must save the day when a deranged Felix traps Bob and Mr. Fischoeder at the Wonder Wharf.
episodes.title: World Wharf II: The Wharfening

episodes.synopsis: Sparks fly as Gene stages an underground performance of his "Die Hard"-inspired musical the same night as the school's "Working Girl"-themed show.
episodes.title: Work Hard or Die Trying, Girl

episodes.synopsis: Tina's budding romance with a ghost sets the middle school rumor mill abuzz and helps boost the restaurant's profile.
episodes.title: Tina and the Real Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Bob vows to help Teddy get healthy, but a stuntman boot camp pushes their friendship to the brink. The kids hold an ice derby in the walk-in freezer.
episodes.title: Friends with Burger-fits

episodes.synopsis: Linda and the kids buck tradition to attend the town's new Thanksgiving festival. But merriment turns to mayhem when crazed birds attack the crowd.
episodes.title: Dawn of the Peck

episodes.synopsis: As Bob faces off with two rivals at a burger-cooking contest, the kids race to find his missing special ingredient. Gene makes a troubling discovery.
episodes.title: Best Burger

episodes.synopsis: A Christmas party forces Bob to revisit a painful chapter from his past as he and his father, "Big Bob," vie to outdo each other in the kitchen.
episodes.title: Father of the Bob

episodes.synopsis: Louise helps Tina spy on her old Thundergirls troop to find out who's leaking cookie secrets to their rivals. Going blonde has an odd effect on Linda.
episodes.title: Tina Tailor Soldier Spy

episodes.synopsis: Tina's bid for a big hall monitor promotion hits a last-minute snag, while Linda's new decorating kick inspires Bob to up his art game.
episodes.title: Midday Run

episodes.synopsis: The kids join a go-kart racing league but have different visions for the team. Bob and Teddy try to hide their new venture from Hugo's prying eyes.
episodes.title: Speakeasy Rider

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to score a plot at the community garden, Bob agrees to let Louise's archenemy work at the restaurant.
episodes.title: Late Afternoon in the Garden of Bob and Louise

episodes.synopsis: Tina agrees to take part in a sham romance, only to discover she's in over her head. Linda's elaborate Valentine's plans go off the rails.
episodes.title: Can't Buy Me Math

episodes.synopsis: Louise scrambles to sabotage Millie's campaign for student body president. Bob's obsession with his new knife stirs up tensions with Teddy.
episodes.title: The Millie-Churian Candidate

episodes.synopsis: Grounded for the weekend, the kids hold a colorful essay contest to compete for a night out with Aunt Gayle.
episodes.title: The Gayle Tales

episodes.synopsis: A broken toy prompts Bob to give Gene a lesson in manliness. Linda urges Tina to think outside the box with a school project.
episodes.title: Li'l Hard Dad

episodes.synopsis: The kids embark on a wild chinchilla chase after Louise's class pet escapes out the front door. Bob's date night plan isn't quite what Linda expected.
episodes.title: Adventures in Chinchilla-Sitting

episodes.synopsis: The kids' Saturday in detention turns into a heated fashion competition. Meanwhile, Bob and Linda smell a scam in a young girl's sales pitch.
episodes.title: The Runway Club

episodes.synopsis: Gene starts a band with his friends, but creative differences soon stir up trouble. Linda struggles with a rash that's bad for business.
episodes.title: The Itty Bitty Ditty Committee

episodes.synopsis: Linda's birthday goes from bad to worse to totally disastrous when Bob shoos her out of the house so he can finish preparing a surprise.
episodes.title: Eat, Spray, Linda

episodes.synopsis: While helping Teddy take care of his employer's beach house, Linda snoops around and begins to suspect the woman of a dark secret.
episodes.title: Housetrap

episodes.synopsis: As Bob and the other boardwalk tenants protest a rent hike, Mr. Fischoeder turns them all against one another with a high-stakes water balloon fight.
episodes.title: The Oeder Games

episodes.synopsis: After bumping into the star of their favorite martial arts show, Bob and Louise jump at the chance to help him with a family problem.
episodes.title: Hawk & Chick
